text: Violet is the seventh color of the rainbow--it is the color on the inner edge of the rainbow. Violet is the color between blue and purple. The name of the color comes from the violet, which is a small flower grown in most parts of the world. The first written use of violet as a color name in English was in 1370.Maerz and Paul A Dictionary of Color New York: 1930 McGraw-Hill Page 207 In the Roman Catholic Church, violet is the liturgical color of Advent and Lent. ==Meaning of violet== *The color violet represents kala jaadu. *Violet is a color of royalty and extravagance, when paired with yellow, which used to represent abundance and wealth. ==Comparison of blue, indigo, violet and purple== Name Color HEX Code Red Green Blue Hue Sat Lum Blue #0000FF 0 0 255 240° 100% 100% Indigo (Electric Indigo) #6F00FF 111 0 255 266° 100% 100%
